description: Vue Web Page to SQAaaS Service
author: dianamariand92 <dianamariand92@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run build && echo 'sqaaas.eosc-synergy.eu' > dist/CNAME  && gh-pages -d dist/
scripts.stage: sed -i '/api/c\ \ \ \ "api" : "https://api-staging.sqaaas.eosc-synergy.eu/v1",' src/env.js && sed -i '/redirect_uri/c\ \ \ \ "redirect_uri" : "http://localhost:8080/callback.html",' src/env.js && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.prod: sed -i '/api/c\ \ \ \ "api" : "https://api.sqaaas.eosc-synergy.eu/v1",' src/env.js && sed -i '/redirect_uri/c\ \ \ \ "redirect_uri" : "https://eosc-synergy.github.io/sqaaas-web/callback",' src/env.js && npm install && npm run dev
